channel.title: Some questions
channel.description:
hey 1. Is there any [u]flat[/u] place where i can put in my corp beast? because if there are any small mountains its a little bit hidden. 2. Can i change that my character doesnt stand "under" corp beast if im attacking it, but some places away? 3. If i go trough the portal for kalphite queen, and then do ::home im flying in the air :D how can i change that? 4. I added one model (elysian) and now if i want to start server it always stucks at preloading models
source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,437590.msg3215789.html#msg3215789

doesnt work, compile error, cant find toZ

try toZ? Or search it first and see if any other commands have it.

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @winnetou1234 winnetou1234
item.description:
@winnetou1234 wrote:

I Vain I:

Try resetting the height level in the command.

there isnt any height lvl
can i make that it tels to
toX = …
toY = …
heightlvl = 0 or something like that?

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @winnetou1234 winnetou1234
item.description:
@winnetou1234 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]1; You can’t request coordinates, plus I don’t know any.
2; It’s handled in NPCHandler.
3; Post your teleport commands.
4; Is your client refactored or not?[/quote]

my home command:

if (command.startsWith("home") && playerRights >= 0) { toX = 2965; toY = 3380; sM("Welcome back to home :[)"); }
and to kalphite queen i come via a portal at home

refactered? idk

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @winnetou1234 winnetou1234
item.description:
@winnetou1234 wrote:

[quote=“durial12, post:2, topic:389923”]1. ::tele 2091 3210 - If I remember rightly that was a nice flat area.
2. That’s all to do with how the model was made. I don’t think you can change that without editing the model.
3. Change the ::home command to include teleing to a different level. Have a look at the ::godownz command.
4. Sounds like either the model is corrupt or you haven’t added it properly. Try removing it then try again.[/quote]

thank you for all, but im only in the air if i tele from kalphite queen area if i tele from shops or corp,… im normal height

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

  1. ::tele 2091 3210 - If I remember rightly that was a nice flat area.
  2. That’s all to do with how the model was made. I don’t think you can change that without editing the model.
  3. Change the ::home command to include teleing to a different level. Have a look at the ::godownz command.
  4. Sounds like either the model is corrupt or you haven’t added it properly. Try removing it then try again.

Read full topic

  4. I added one model (elysian) and now if i want to start server it always stucks at preloading models
